title: Carine Roitfeld
short: An inspirational website for Carine Roitfeld by e-commerce specialists Ask Phill.
body: Built as a digital flagship store for Carine Roitfeld by e-commerce specialists [Ask Phill](https://askphill.com/). > Our headless ecommerce solution is based on Shopify, Prismic and Gatsby and enables the client to sell multi-market while using one Shopify backend. Besides that we've been able to sustain a high loading speed while using next-gen high quality media. - Ask Phill Featuring a ton of clean animations, page transitions and smooth scrolling. The overall experience gives a feeling of luxury and experience to this high-end brand.[](http://autumn.amsterdam/ "http\://autumn.amsterdam/") [Take a look](https://www.carineroitfeld.com/)! ## Related Posts: * [Inspirational Agency Portfolio Websites \[April 2020]](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-04-01-inspirational-agency-portfolio-websites-april-2020)
